Detailed Description

The system that handles the scripts of the objects.

)

The name of the *.lua script to attach to the next object.

Parameters
idThe id of the object to add to the scripting system.
filenameThe name of the .lua script file.
libsThe desired libraries you need for this object. Defaults to tnt::lua::lib::core.
